p.d: The 4 year-old twins Cannelle and Pruneau, move into a new house with their parents. The children learn to deal with all the different situations that arise in everyday life, helped by their friends and three rather strange characters: Passe-Partout, Passe-Montagne and Passe-Carreau. Directed by: Alain Jacques, Julien Hurteau, Marie-Julie Parent (season 1, Canada, 2019) Cast: Élodie Grenier (Passe-Partout), Gabrielle Fontaine (Passe-Carreau), Jean-François C. Pronovost (Passe-Montagne), Widemir Normil (Fardoche), Danielle Proulx (Grandmother)
